lore: Massive constructs formed from enchanted stone, Stone Golems can be found in the Crystal Caverns or even guarding the entrance to the King's Castle. These hulking creatures are formidable adversaries, possessing immense strength and resilience. They attack with powerful, crushing blows and can withstand a significant amount of damage.

abilities.title: Thorn Whip
abilities.lore: Nature's grasp turns to thorny wrath, a reminder of the darkness that dwells within.

abilities.title: Earthquake Slam
abilities.description: Generates corrupted root tiles. When roots appear, they destroy tile they appear at. If there are root tiles, they deal dark damage.
abilities.lore: From the depths of his corrupted heart, Thalendros shakes the very foundations of nature.

abilities.title: Dark Aura
abilities.description: Corrupts some tiles of a random target with dark aura. When the ability triggers on a corrupted tile, that character is dealt with massive darkness damage
abilities.lore: Darkness takes hold, corrupting all it touches, turning allies into unwitting foes.
